this place is TASTY!my husband and I saw all the terrific Yelp reviews this place had and just knew we had to try it. we were not disappointed.the owners of the shop are husband and wife (and extremely sweet to boot) and love what they do, which is so very cool to see. their passion for food and their customers' satisfaction of their food makes this place superb.I had the relleno especial which came with an empanada (I got the carne empanada and loved it), dessert, and drink. overall, the relleno was good, but the sauce was a little too sweet for my taste. I had a brownie as my dessert which I wouldn't really recommend- great texture, very moist, but just not that great of a taste. and they offer 1 type of beer: San Miguel, which I enjoyed.Andrew had the provolone relleno with crema de pesto and it was FANTASTIC. he definitely ordered better than I did. he had red wine and for dessert, a caramel chocolate piece of cake which was so incredibly good. if you go, you should stick with Andrew's order!!in summary, come here for a good, filling, hearty meal served by passionate, friendly, attentive people. the atmosphere isn't what makes this place so good, so don't come for this reason alone.
